text: We may store and process information in various locations throughout the globe, including through cloud services.
We use cookies on the Websites.
If you find the information on your account is not accurate, complete or updated, please provide us with the necessary information in order to correct it.
Recolabs may retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.

We may also share personal data to comply with applicable laws and regulations or to respond to a lawful request for information we receive.
We may retain your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and process your inquiries, respond to your requests and improve our Websites and/or services we provide.
